    • class Spot

    Attributes

    double q protected
    the main parameter ( P(X>z_q) < q )
    bool bounded protected
    if true, the number of stored will be bounded by max_excess
    int max_excess protected
    Maximum number of stored excesses (bounded mode)
    bool alert protected
    if true, the algorithm triggers alarms (the outlier is not taking into account in the model)
    bool up protected
    if true, compute upper threshold
    bool down protected
    if true, compute lower threshold
    int n_init protected
    number of observation to perform calibration
    double level protected
    level of the update threshold (0<l<1)
    int n protected
    Number of normal observations (not the alarms)
    int Nt_up protected
    Number of up excesses
    int Nt_down protected
    Number of down excesses
    int al_up protected
    Number of up alarms
    int al_down protected
    Number of down alarms
    vector‹double› init_batch protected
    initial batch (for calibration)
    double t_up protected
    transitional up threshold
    double t_down protected
    transitional down threshold
    double z_up protected
    up alert thresholds
    double z_down protected
    down alert thresholds
    GPDfit upper_bound protected
    Object to compute the upper threshold
    GPDfit lower_bound protected
    Object to compute the lower threshold

    Methods

    void fitup() protected
    GPD fit for the upper bound (update upper threshold)
    void fitdown() protected
    GPD fit for the lower bound (update upper threshold)
    Spot(double q=1e-3, int n_init=1000) public
    Default constructor.
    Spot(double q, vector< double > init_data) public
    Constructor with risk parametrization (q) and initial batch.
    Spot(double q, int n_init, double level, bool up, bool down, bool alert, bool bounded, int max_excess) public
    Full parametrizable constructor.
    Spot(double q, vector< double > init_data, double level, bool up, bool down, bool alert, bool bounded, int max_excess) public
    Full parametrizable constructor with initial batch.
    Spot(SpotConfig conf) public
    create a Spot object according to the configuration
    bool operator==(const Spot &spot) const public
    Spot configuration comparison.
    Spot operator+(const Spot &spot) const public
    Merge 2 Spot instances.
    SPOTEVENT step(double v) public
    Spot iteration.
    void calibrate() public
    Perform Spot initial calibration (after the first n_init observations)
    SpotStatus status() public
    Get the internal state of the Spot instance.
    string stringStatus() public
    Get the internal state of the Spot instance (display-ready)
    string log(int log_level) public
    Return the current state of the Spot instance through a single line string.
    SpotConfig config() const public
    Return the configuration of the Spot instance.
    double getUpperThreshold() public
    Get the current upper threshold.
    double getLowerThreshold() public
    Get the current lower threshold.
    Bounds getThresholds() public
    Get the current thresholds (through a Bounds structure)
    double getUpper_t() public
    Get the upper excess quantile.
    double getLower_t() public
    Get the lower excess quantile.
    void set_q(double q_new) public
    Set the risk parameter q.
    double up_probability(double z) public
    Give the probability to observe things higher than a value.
    double down_probability(double z) public
    Give the probability to observe things lower than a value.
